summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jeffrey Epstein, Jes Staley, and Rosa M da Silva discussing a contact related to Epstein. The email highlights the confidential nature of the communication and includes a request for contact information for an individual associated with Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the central figure in the correspondence, requesting contact information for an individual who is supposed to be covering for him.

Jeffrey Epstein is requesting contact information for an individual who is supposed to be covering for him.
